text: Phri wahi hai jisne maweshiyon mein se woh jaanwar bhi paida kiye jinse sawari o baar-bardaari (burden) ka kaam liya jata hai aur woh bhi jo khane aur bichane ke kaam aate hain. Khao un cheezon mein se jo Allah ne tumhein bakshi hain aur shaytan ki pairwi na karo ke woh tumhara khula dushman hai
